title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull & manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Bun, Deno and browsers (via proxy).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models for chat, embeddings, tool-calling and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat interface, model manager, RAG, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Android support; offers sync/async APIs and Kotlin coroutines.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; simple interface to chat, generate and pull models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-powered interactive CLI for Ollama with readline, syntax highlighting and conversation history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-style code-completion engine for VS Code.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with optional GPU node-affinity and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-chatbot
summary: Minimal Next.js chatbot template that streams answers from a local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C# / .NET client for Ollama with async enumerable streaming.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app that exposes Ollama models as async chat and embedding REST endpoints.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight RAG pipeline using Ollama for embeddings + generation and Chroma for vector storage.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that brings Ollama models into any server with slash commands.

title: ollama-sdks
summary: Meta-repo tracking community SDKs (Go, Rust, Swift, PHP, Elixir, Dart) for Ollama.

title: ollama-napi
summary: NPM package: native Node-API bindings for Ollama delivering high-performance token generation.

title: ollama-py
summary: PyPI mirror of the official ollama Python client for users who prefer the ollama-py name.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama with Tokio and Serde.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset letting you use Ollama models in production retrieval pipelines.
